thread.title: Photographer Paul Graham Reprints Coveted Book

author: Sara Morosi
title: Photographer Paul Graham Reprints Coveted Book
text: BRITISH PHOTOGRAPHER Paul Grahamâ€™s 12-volume collection titled A Shimmer of Possibility, which captures everyday life across America through sequences of images that juxtapose struggle with optimism, was available for just 10 weeks in late 2007 before selling out. With the exception of a softcover release in 2009, it has been out of print ever since. A new edition of the photography book, which abandons its initial multicolor cover presentation (each volume in a distinct hue) for a uniform purple, came out this February in London and will be released in New York at the 2018 Association of International Photography Art...
